Description.Text: Chateau Camiole Resort & Spa is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable studio and apartment accommodation in Callian, northeast of Saint-Raphael. It boasts a luxury spa, outdoor swimming pools, restaurants and picturesque surroundings. Callian is a medieval village situated in a peaceful hilltop setting in the Esterel Mountains. The area is notable for its charming villages and stunning views. Nearby places of interest include Saint-Raphael, Cannes and Grasse. The resort occupies numerous modern villas spread across seven hectares of land. Facilities include a heated indoor swimming pool, children's pool, tennis courts, outdoor swimming pools, sauna, steam bath and spa treatment rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Studios are spacious and decorated in a modern style. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning, telephone and a well-equipped kitchenette with a ceramic hob, microwave, oven, coffee maker and fridge. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. Every studio and apartment contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals. Free parking is possible onsite.
